p: Other compounds identified are: (a) Triterpenes (such as 3,16,21 trihydroxy-ursaeno, ursadiol, heliantrioles (A 0 B 1, B 2 and C), loliolide, 3,16,28 trihydroxy olean-12-ene, 3,16,28 trihydroxy lup-20 ene, and calenduloside F); (b) essential oil (conformed basically by depedunculatin, α and β ionones, oxido-transcarophyllene, carvone, caryophyllene, cardinoles, geranyl acetone, oplopanone, γ-mourolene, α-cardinone, and torryol); (c) phenolic acids (mainly coumaric, gentisic, vanillic, caffeic, o-hydroxyphenylacetic, protocatechinic, ferulic, p-hydroxybenzoic, and salicylic); (d) coumarins (such as scopoletin, umbeliferone, and esculetin); and (e) saponins [ 135, 136, 140, 141, 144].
